body.name: LOHONER Wooden Utensil Holder for Kitchen Counter, Large Acacia Utensil Holder for Countertop with 3 Compartment, Cooking Utensil Organizer, Silverware Caddy with DIY Greeting Cards
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs
features: PREMIUM QUALITY ACACIA WOOD - This utensil holder is made of high quality acacia wood and is coated with varnish to make it durable and avoid damp. We insist on using high-quality solid wood rather than cheap pine and artificial density boards.

EXTRA LARGE UTENSIL HOLDER - With three compartments, our utensil holder for countertop offers ample space to keep all your kitchen essentials neatly organized. From cooking spoons and whisks to spatulas and tongs, you can easily store a wide range of utensils.SIZE :12"x 4.7"x 6.8"

NATURAL AND RUSTIC APPEARANCE - This is a perfect addition to your wood kitchen accessories that blends nature and organization to countertop. Natural acacia wood color can add some warm tones to your kitchen，also can be paired with a variety of kitchen decoration styles.

DIY UNIQUE GIFT - We know that there are many friends who would like to have a unique utensil holder as part of their kitchen. So we have this DIY solution for you. We provide you with 6 different styles of postcards. You can choose and write your wishes to match the utensil holder according to your preference. Of course, you can also match the utensil holder with some precious photos to make it more meaningful. This must be a good gift for mom, grandma or good friends！
THE PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 Large-sized acacia wood utensil holder, 1 clear acrylic plate, and 6 diy cards in different styles.
body.description: Declutter and organize your kitchen while keeping all of your cooking utensils in easy reach. A recyclable tool that will help you keep a kitchen free of mess, this is also made free from health-damaging contents and with the sustainability of the environment. This convenient kitchen countertop organizer will ensure everything is tidy, safe, and in place. This is more than just your kitchen utensil organizer with functionality and refined aesthetics. A kitchen holder made from Acacia wood, this is designed to last and be sturdy enough for years of use. It will be a contemporary addition to your kitchen setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice piece for your kitchen. The wood is sturdy the color is just right. The plastic piece with the cards isn’t necessary for me, but I see how someone might like it! Definitely worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality countertop utensil organizer
reviews.reviewText: I don't know that the cards/magnetic cover add anything to this. The magnets are hidden (mounted from the inside), so if you don't want to use that part, no one would ever know. I guess it could be fine if you want to slide some decorative card behind the acrylic plate to add some color to your countertop display, but a greeting card? Seems odd.Anyway, this is a good quality, wooden utensil organizer. I finally got tired of digging through my utensil drawer to find these things, and figured it'd save precious drawer space by putting them on the counter instead. It won't fit everything (some things are just not sized well), but it holds a LOT. If you have a pared-down sample of cooking utensils, then you might be able to use the other spaces for serving utensils and/or tableware utensils.I particularly like how much it holds, and that it's big enough to remain stable. It's not heavy, so you can still tip it over easily if you don't pull something out completely. Otherwise, this is a simple, attractive design that should be at home on most countertops. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars gorgeous utensil organization
reviews.reviewText: Large gorgeous wooden box with three separate sections and a spot on the front side for a magnetic clear plate to be added (lovely floral inserts are included for this, but I prefer the look of the beautiful wooden box itself). It’s a definite improvement to have dedicated spots for spoons, spatulas, and tongs. I used to have every utensil stuffed in a large vase and would have to dig out half of them to find what I was looking for, but now I know exactly where to look to find what I need in that critical cooking moment. In hindsight, it’s a long overdue improvement to my kitchen that really helps make cooking more efficient and pleasant! I did notice an unpleasant odor when I first unboxed this, so I let it air out for a few days before using it, and that seems to have done the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice natural wood utensil holder
reviews.reviewText: Items made with natural walnut or acacia wood are always very nice because of the rich unique patterns in the wood. This acacia utensil holder does not disappoint. The design is simple and functional, the finish is smooth and aesthetically pleasing. It is nicely weighted so it will not tip over even when t is only holding a few utensils. It has four magnetic points on one side, which the included plexiglass sign holder attaches to. It is a nice idea to be able to write custom messages or labels on the included cards.Very Nice Natural Wood

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for storing Kitchen utensils
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice wooden storage for kitchen utensils.The quality of the wood is SO nice.You can store so many cooking utensils in here.This is a great value and a great addition to my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made utensil box.
reviews.reviewText: This utensil holder is beautifully made with plenty of space to hold all of your kitchen items! I love that it is quite spacious with three compartments for you to sort specific utensils together if you want to. There is a clear acryclic board that magnetically connects to the front of the container so that you can write on it with dry erase markers. It also comes with a variety of floral and colored papers to place behind the acrylic for extra decoration. This is a very cute piece of farmhouse style decor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Pretty Kitchen Utensil Holder!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really like this kitchen utensil holder. I love the wood grain on it - it’s just beautiful. The craftsmanship is very well done and the material is great quality.The cards that come with it can be written on to say whatever you want them to. There’s a plastic plate they go on that has magnets on it and sticks right on the side of the utensil holder. I’m not sure how the signs are supposed to stick to the plastic plate as it didn’t come with any adhesive stickers or anything like that so I’m guessing you would just use glue or tape. What I appreciate about the magnetic plate and varying signs is that it can be customized to however you like and the message you write on it is personal and custom. I also really appreciate that this is an optional feature rather than coming as a permanent one. All his makes this item very customizable and versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Combines convenience with functionality
reviews.reviewText: Always searching for the right implement for the job is an issue in our house and this makes them all easily accessible and movable. I like the wood I like the constructions of very smooth and nice finish I also like the magnets with the insert where you can actually put notes or recipes to watch and look at while you work
